title: Complete a PM Checklist
description: A technician is performing a scheduled preventive maintenance task and needs to complete the associated checklist.

tasks.description: Open the maintenance work order to access the digital PM checklist.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent opens the work order on their mobile device and sees the list of PM tasks.

tasks.description: Perform each task on the list (e.g., 'Check fluid levels', 'Lubricate bearings') and mark it as complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician completes all physical tasks and checks them off in the system.

tasks.description: Sign off on the completed PM work order and log the time spent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully closes the PM work order, and the asset's maintenance history is updated.
